TopicTitle: Mod Request - Precision Time Warp & Warp to Sunrise

Articles.Content: If i knew how to code C# i would make this instantly. But it would be nice if we had a mod that allowed us to warp to a specific day (for precision transfer window) and also allow us to warp to sunrise in ksp 1. On top of that kerbal alarm clock would be great, which i would assume being able to timewarp to a specific day would help the alarm clock work
Kerbal Alarm Clock would also be a welcome mod!

The idea of having a convenient "warp to sunrise" is a good one, and the existing framework for my alarm clock mod can definitely handle it. I have a ton of stuff I want to add already, will put that on my list
